summary: Company marketing website rebranded to Bytera Studios with a dark theme, Australian English copy, improved readability of the regional NSW-based messaging section, updated pricing plan copy (Basic/Standard/Premium) with Standard highlighted as Most Popular, and the user‚Äôs full logo used in the top-left header.
architectural_notes: Site should use a dark theme while maintaining the existing elegant brand direction (avoid blue/purple-dominant palette).
Navigation should include a Pricing tab/page and an Example Website tab/section (in place of Testimonials).
Use Australian English across all copy.
Header top-left branding must use the user's full provided logo (not cropped/partial) next to the company name.
Pricing section: Standard plan should be marked 'Most Popular' and visually emphasized; Premium plan includes priority support.
Ensure top/header area is fully dark (avoid grey/light appearance) and improve contrast/readability for the regional NSW messaging section.
Remove/omit the Featured Work section from the layout/navigation.
About Us section/page should include an enquiry link that opens an email to bytera.studios@gmail.com.
Logo presentation request: circular logo mark next to the brand name with a neon-ish style compatible with the dark theme (while keeping header branding in the top-left).
Pricing section: Standard plan should list Basic SEO (not Advanced SEO).
known_issues: Regional NSW-based messaging section has readability/contrast issues (user cannot read the first part).
Landing page/hero background uses grey check pattern that reduces readability; needs a more brand-suitable, higher-contrast background.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for the website-building company ‚ÄúPulse-Pixel Studies‚Äù with the slogan ‚Äúengineering elegance into every pixel.‚Äù (use this exact capitalization and punctuation for the slogan wherever it appears).

Implement a single-page marketing layout with clear sections: Header/nav, Hero (name + slogan + primary CTA), Services, Process/How it works, Work/Portfolio (placeholder items), Testimonials (placeholder quotes), About, and Contact CTA/footer.

Define and apply a cohesive visual theme for Pulse-Pixel Studies across the entire site (colors, typography, spacing, button style, section styling). Choose a distinct, elegant style that matches the slogan; do not use a blue/purple-dominant palette.

Add the required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the layout (logo in header/footer; hero visual in the hero section; subtle background pattern applied to at least one section).

Make the site load in dark theme by default (no user toggle required), applying dark-mode styling consistently across all sections while preserving the existing elegant copper/amber accent direction and keeping the slogan text exactly as ‚Äúengineering elegance into every pixel.‚Äù wherever it appears.

Update the main-page copy to describe Pulse-Pixel Studios as a regional New South Wales (NSW), Australia-based company, including a clear ‚Äúwho we are‚Äù message in the primary marketing copy (Hero and/or About section).
Add a ‚ÄúPricing‚Äù tab/link in the header navigation that scrolls to a new Pricing section on the page, displaying three monthly plan options priced at 120 AUD, 175 AUD, and 215 AUD per month.

Replace the existing Testimonials tab/section with an ‚ÄúExample Website‚Äù tab/section: update the header navigation label and anchor, remove the Testimonials section content, and add a new Example Website section that showcases a single sample website example (a visual preview area and short descriptive text).

Rebrand the marketing site from ‚ÄúPulse-Pixel Studios‚Äù to ‚ÄúBytera Studios‚Äù across the header, Hero section, About section, image alt text, and any other visible marketing copy, while keeping the slogan text exactly as ‚Äúengineering elegance into every pixel.‚Äù wherever it appears.
Replace the top-left header branding image with the user-provided full Bytera Studios logo (not a partial mark), and ensure it renders cleanly in the fixed header on both desktop and mobile.

Update the Pricing section to use exactly the provided plan names and bullet features for: üíª Basic ‚Äî $120 AUD, üöÄ Standard ‚Äî $175 AUD, üåü Premium ‚Äî $215 AUD; keep Standard visually highlighted as ‚ÄúMost Popular‚Äù, and ensure Premium includes ‚ÄúPriority support during build.‚Äù as a listed feature.

Improve readability of the ‚ÄòBased in regional New South Wales‚Ä¶‚Äô (‚Äúwho we are‚Äù) messaging in the Hero and/or About sections so the first part is clearly legible on the dark theme, without removing the NSW/Australia positioning.

Update the site‚Äôs visual styling so the entire marketing site uses a cohesive dark theme with a neon-accent look (including updated accent/primary colours, glows/shadows as appropriate), while keeping all text and UI elements clearly legible and high-contrast across all sections.

Revise the header branding layout so that a circular Bytera Studios logo mark appears next to the brand name text, and reposition the existing header branding element to the top-left as requested, ensuring the result looks clean in the fixed header on both desktop and mobile.

Remove the ‚ÄúFeatured Work‚Äù (Portfolio) section from the single-page layout, including: removing the section from the page, removing/renaming any header navigation link that points to it, and removing any CTA/button that scrolls to it (e.g., the hero ‚ÄòView Our Work‚Äô button).
In the About section, add an ‚ÄúEnquiry‚Äù link that opens the user‚Äôs email client via a mailto link to bytera.studios@gmail.com.
Update the Pricing section so the Standard plan feature currently shown as ‚ÄúAdvanced SEO‚Äù is changed to ‚ÄúBasic SEO‚Äù (and the Standard plan no longer mentions Advanced SEO).

Update the header branding so that the logo displayed next to the ‚ÄúBytera Studios‚Äù brand text is the user‚Äôs logo presented in a clean circular design (logo positioned to the left of the brand text), and ensure it renders sharply in the fixed header on both desktop and mobile.

Replace the current landing-page (Hero section) background pattern (the grey check/grid look) with a brand-suitable background treatment that preserves the neon dark theme and significantly improves text readability/contrast for all Hero copy.

Update the marketing page styling so that all visible text content from the top of the page through the end of the Hero section (i.e., everything before the ‚ÄúOur Services‚Äù section) displays as white (#FFFFFF) and bold, including the header brand text and navigation labels, and all Hero copy.
Update the landing page Hero primary CTA button label "Start Your Project" so its text renders in white (#FFFFFF) and bold, consistent with the rest of the header + Hero text styling.

Update the ‚ÄúAbout Bytera Studios‚Äù section so that all body text under the ‚ÄúAbout Bytera Studios‚Äù heading (including the subheading line and all paragraph copy in the section) renders in black (#000000).
Remove the "5+" / "Years Experience" and "50+" / "Projects Completed" statistic blocks from the About section so these claims no longer appear anywhere on the page.
Remove the footer attribution line at the bottom of the page that says the site was "Built with" and links to "caffeine.ai" so that "made using caffeine ai" (or equivalent) no longer appears.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a marketing website for Pulse-Pixel Studies with the slogan "engineering elegance into every pixel."
Switch the site to a dark theme (ensure cohesive styling across the site).
Update main page copy to describe Pulse-Pixel Studies as a regional NSW-based company ("who we are" messaging).
Add a Pricing page/tab with three monthly options: 120 AUD, 175 AUD, 215 AUD.
Replace the Testimonials tab/section with an Example Website tab/section showcasing a sample site.
Rebrand the site from Pulse-Pixel Studies to Bytera Studios (update name and related branding text).
Replace header/top-left branding with the user's full, actual logo (not partial); place it next to the company name.
Update all site copy to Australian English.
Improve readability/contrast of the 'based in regional NSW' (who we are) messaging section, especially the first part that is currently hard to read.
Update the Pricing section to the provided plan descriptions (Basic/Standard/Premium), make Standard visually stand out as 'Most Popular', and ensure Premium includes priority support.
Remove the Featured Work section from the site.
Add an enquiry link on the About Us page that emails bytera.studios@gmail.com (mailto link).
Update header branding so the logo next to the brand name is circular and matches a neon-ish dark-theme style; ensure correct placement in the top-left header area.
Update Pricing: change the Standard plan feature from Advanced SEO to Basic SEO.
Replace the landing page background pattern (remove the grey checks) with a brand-suitable background that improves text readability/contrast.
Make all text content before the 'Our Services' section display as white and bold for improved readability.
Make the top-right "Get Started" header button text render white (#FFFFFF) and bold.
Set all text under the "About Bytera Studios" heading/section to black (improve contrast as requested).
Remove the ‚Äú5+ years‚Äù, ‚Äú50 clients‚Äù, and ‚Äúmade using caffeine ai‚Äù text from the bottom/footer of the site.
